entry.title: Proposed BIP for OP_CAT
entry.summary:
The email discusses the possibility of enabling OP_CAT on Bitcoin and the preference for using OP_SUCCESS126 instead of OP_SUCCESS80. The sender expresses their willingness to switch to OP_SUCCESS126 if there is enough interest and desire within the community. They also mention that they do not have a specific preference for OP_SUCCESS80. The sender then asks if anyone objects to using OP_SUCCESS126.
In summary, the email addresses the potential inclusion of OP_CAT on Bitcoin and the choice between OP_SUCCESS126 and OP_SUCCESS80. The sender indicates their willingness to adopt OP_SUCCESS126 based on community interest and seeks input from others regarding this decision.
